TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: No Backstory Incapabilities
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Removes all work incapabilities from backstories, both adulthood and childhood, including modded. Humanoid Alien Races backstories might not be affected as they use a separate def.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Boomalopes Bleed Chemfuel
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Changes the blood def from boomalopes and boomrats to be chemfuel puddles instead.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Chatty Comms
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Adds a recreation type to comms consoles allowing them to be used by pawns to gain recreation through 'chatting'.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Destroy Anything
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Allows the smelting of pretty much anything anything in the crematorium aside from weapons, apparel and minified buildings. Be careful so you don't burn anything important.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Disable Narrow Heads
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Removes the narrow head shapes, they do not fit many of even the vanilla hair and beard styles properly and thanks to 1.4 making them defs it is very easy to just YEET. Can cause errors due to mods commonly directly referencing the removed head types.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Don't Pack Food
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Prevents pawns from stuffing food into their inventory to carry around.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Full Deconstruct Return
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Returns the full amount it takes to build something. No more punishment for moving a building that isn't uninstallable.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Glowing Ambrosia
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Gives Ambrosia a slight glow around it, making natural spawning Ambrosia easier to find on a map in the dark.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Glowing Healroot
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Gives Healroot a slight glow around it, making natural spawning Healroot easier to find on a map in the dark.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Growable Ambrosia
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Allows the growing of Ambrosia in plant zones.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Growable Grass
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Allows the growing of grass and tall grass in plant zones. If you have Biotech you can also grow grey grass from that.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Growable Mushrooms
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Allows the growing of Glowstool and Agarilux in plant zones.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Growable Wild Berries
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Allows the growing of wild berries in plant zones.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Healroot to Xerigium
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Reverts the old name change of the herbal medicine plant Healroot back to Xerigium like it used to be in older game versions.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Hidden Wires
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Visually hides the ugly wires that connect to the power conduits from buildings that don't specifically need to be placed on top of conduits.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Incident Pawn Stats
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Displays the information of any pawns rewarded as part of incidents.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Infestation Blocking Floors
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Prevents infestations happening on harder floors (anything crafted from metal or stone materials). Only prevents the event picking that spot, hives can still spawn on them if an event happens closeby.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Insulting Spree Nerf
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description:
Makes the Insulting Spree mental break less annoying to deal with.
- Intensity: Minor to Major
- Max Duration: 45,000 ticks to 20,000 ticks
- Min Duration: 25,000 ticks to 2,500 ticks
- Base Event Chance: 0.5 to 0.15

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Impassable Deep Water
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Changes deep water to be impassable by pawns, preventing them from pathing through it.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Lag Free Lamps
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Removes the fuel comp from fuelled lamps, so they now no longer run code constantly they impact performance that little bit less.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Lower Prisoner Expectations
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Brings prisoner expectations down to a more reasonable 'low expectations' level. They just tried to kill your colony most of the time, they don't deserve to have expectations.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Megasloth to Megatherium
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Reverts the name change of the Megatherium so it retains the obviously cooler name.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Misanthrope Trait
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Adds the misanthrope trait (dislikes humans), also makes it so if a pawn was going to spawn with both the misandrist and misogynist traits that they instead get the misanthrope trait.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Next Restock Timer
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Displays in the world map information of settlements whether or not they have restocked since you last visited and how long till their next restock.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: No Breakdowns
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Removes the breakdown comp from anything that has it, artificially enforced resource sinks are LAZY.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Skilled Stonecutting
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Makes stonecutting give crafting skill increases, and makes more skilled crafters create blocks quicker.

TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.label: Faster Smoothing
TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.description: Changes the speed at which stone smoothing is done to a custom value.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Enabled
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Changes the speed at which stone smoothing is done to a custom value.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Speed Factor
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Changes the speed at which stone smoothing is done to a custom value.

TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.label: Hunters Can Use Melee
TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.description: Allows hunters to use melee, regardless of how well they can do so.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Enabled
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Allows hunters to use melee, regardless of how well they can do so.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Allow Fists
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Allows hunters to use their fists to hunt, stupid but it works.

TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.label: No Friend Shaped Manhunters
TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.description: Sets parameters which decide if an animal can arrive as manhunter or not. This does not prevent it happening if they take damage. This can result in the initial Royalty quest not firing as it requires manhunting animal that specifically fits the parameters this tweak is designed to prevent, I'd recommend enabling this AFTER that quest.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Enabled
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Sets parameters which decide if an animal can arrive as manhunter or not.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Prevent By Trainability
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Controls whether intermediate or advanced trainable animals can be manhunters.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Prevent If Nuzzle-able
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If animal can nuzzle, it won't spawn as part of manhunter incidents.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Prevent If Wildness Below
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If the animals wildness is below this value, it won't spawn as part of manhunter incidents.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Prevent If Combat Power Below
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If the animals combat power is below this value, it won't spawn as part of manhunter incidents.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Prevent When Taming
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Prevents animals that fit the parameters from turning manhunter when taming.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Enabled
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, allows the skill tweaks to function.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Skill Loss Multiplier
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Multiplier on rate of skill loss.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Skill Gain Multiplier
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Multiplier on rate of skill gain.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Skill Loss Threshold
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: The level a skill has to reach before skill loss starts happening, it will prevent skill loss entirely below that level.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Skill Learning Per Day
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: After a set amount of xp has been learnt for this skill since the last midnight passes, the amount that that can be learnt is lowered. This lets you change how much xp a pawn can gain in any given skill before that kicks in.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Disable Taint
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, apparel will not be tainted at all, doesn't apply retroactively to existing tainted apparel.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Taint on Rot
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, apparel will be tainted when a pawn begins rotting rather than when they die.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Only Taint First Layer
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, only apparel covering the innermost layer will be tainted, typically this will result in armour being fine but clothing being tainted.

TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.label: Prisoners Don't Have Keys
TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.description: Selectively controls whether prisoners and slaves can open doors during breakout and rebellion.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Enabled
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Selectively controls whether prisoners and slaves can open doors during breakout and rebellion.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Applies to Prisoners
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Whether or not this applies to prisoners.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Applies to Slaves
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Whether or not this applies to slaves.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Can Open Own Door
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Whether or not escaping pawns can open their own door, the one leading into their cell.

TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.label: Slim Rim
TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.description: Allows the limiting of pawn body tpes on generation, the replacement will be either Male or Female depending on the pawns current gender.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Enabled
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Allows the limiting of pawn body types on generation, the replacement will be either Male or Female depending on the pawns current gender.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Fat
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, limits the fat body type from spawning.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Hulk
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, limits the hulk body type from spawning.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Thin
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, limits the thin body type from spawning.

TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.label: Trait Count Adjustment
TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.description: As of 1.4 this isn't fully functional, changes to the way traits generate made it so the first 1-3 can always generate like normal, regardless of what I do. So this is only usefuly currently for those who want to guarantee more than 1 or have more in general. Won't affect newborns/children as they have a complicated system for their growth.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Enabled
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, allows the range to take effect.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Trait Count Range
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Range count of traits which can generate.
